column4: Hello, I need help with a network problem.  I am running ubuntu 7.10 with a built-in nvidia gigabit network controller and I am only getting 8 MB/S transfer to a fileserver running linux samba.  I get 40+ MB/S with windows dual booted on the same machine.  Please Help!
Probably related to your driver, but that's all I know
Maybe... maybe not. I really have no idea
I know how to do it in Firefox, but not system-wide
